reviews.review_msg: The most fun that I have had in any of my classes (Oh Yeah, I learned tonnes of stuff too!!).  Onkar is a great teacher and he really cared about the students!!  Easy to learn from and definitely easy on the eyes (goodlooking with a capital "G").  Everytime he smiled, a group of us girls simply melted.  Hope he teaches again.  The TAs rocked too.
Onkar did a super job teaching 312 last semester.  Hopefully he teaches again in the near future.  Exams were very fair.  Gotta love the smile =:)
Great teacher. Easy/straight-forward/organized notes and exams. For exams, just memorize notes.

He's an awesome guy but HOT?????? I mean he is alright, and good looking enough, but HOT?? uh no...and what is with that Butt comment....!!! Onkar, was that you??? Yeah but great course. BUT in order to do well you MUST MUST MUST memorize all the stupid things cause he does exam you on them
The Onk is unreal!  And what a butt!  It was so round and firm, it often distracted me in class, though.  A great prof and a snappy dresser...and don't even get me started about the doo-rag.
awesome prof. Very interesting to listen to but I must admit, sometimes its hard to pay attention because he is sooooo damm hot. Hes such a dream boat.
Onkar is a great prof.  His classes were very informative and fun!  If you get the chance take a class with him.  It will be worth it!

Wow! Onkar's got it all going on.  He is smart, young (I think he said he was 25), and definitely handsome.  His course is a real eye opener to what is going on in environmental toxicology.  Lectures will clear and exams were very fair.  He really wants you to learn.  The bandana adds character.
What can I say?  Onkar is da man!  His lectures were entertaining and very relevant to what is going on around us.  Guest lecturers were a good idea as well.  BONUS-He is definitely a hottie!
Exams were fair although more clarity in lecture would be appreciated.
